name: Goddess Bowl with Ginger Nama Shoyu Sauce
description: A healthy grain bowl with quinoa, avocado, eggs, and kale, topped with a creamy ginger-tahini sauce.

ingredients.item: 6 inches of fresh peeled ginger, chopped
3 tablespoon of Tamari Sauce (or Nama Shoyu or Soy Sauce)
6 tablespoons of Tahini (sesame seed butter basically)
3 tablespoon of olive oil (or flax oil)

instructions: Combine the garlic and ginger in a mini food processor or blender. Blend well.
Add in the remaining ingredients and blend until you have a creamy consistency.
You may add more water if you would like a less thick sauce.
